Smart Barier

Urządzenie umożliwiające zdalne otworzenie szlabanu

About the project

The problem that this project had to solve was limited access to the remotes opening the barrier, which is located at the entrance to the parking lot at the office. For this purpose, I used one remote, which is activated by a relay, a GSM module and a processor STM32 F103. The gate is activated by a message sent to the processor via a mobile application.

Main control board

The control board constantly listens to the message that has been sent and open the barrier or sends back its current state.

Prepared device for installation

Electronics mounted in the enclosure, including battery, charging circuit, power supply and control board.

By Mateusz Janus
